channel.title: bluestvDOTorg
channel.description:
Bringing the best Colorado Blues live into your living room!
John Stadlers Tuesday Blues is aired on Boulder Countys CC54 TV every Tuesday from 7 to 8 pm
channel.itunes:summary: Bringing the best Colorado Blues live into your computer and I-Pod
channel.itunes:subtitle: Blues TV Podcast
